name: AddStaticPickup
notes: This function doesn't return a pickup ID that you can use in, for example, OnPlayerPickUpPickup. Use CreatePickup if you'd like to assign IDs.
description: This function adds a 'static' pickup to the game. These pickups support weapons, health, armor etc., with the ability to function without scripting them (weapons/health/armor will be given automatically).

params_body.name: type
params_body.description: The pickup type. Determines how the pickup responds when picked up.

params_body.name: Float:X
params_body.description: The X coordinate to create the pickup at.

params_body.name: Float:Y
params_body.description: The Y coordinate to create the pickup at.

params_body.name: Float:Z
params_body.description: The Z coordinate to create the pickup at.

params_body.name: virtualworld
params_body.description: The virtual world ID to put tht pickup in. Use -1 to show the pickup in all worlds.

return_values:
1 if the pickup is successfully created.

0 if failed to create.
related_fn:
CreatePickup: Create a pickup.
 DestroyPickup: Destroy a pickup.
 OnPlayerPickUpPickup: Called when a player picks up a pickup.
related_cb: OnPlayerPickUpPickup: Called when a player picks up a pickup.
